name: Correspondent Banking
details: Correspondent Banking Reimbursement Axis Bank Limited, Colombo offers reimbursement facility under Letters of Credit to banks / correspondents subject to arrangement. Export LC advising Axis Bank Limited, Colombo, offers LC Advising facility to banks / correspondents subject to arrangement. Confirmation of Export LCs Axis Bank Limited, Colombo provides LC Confirmation services to various Banks across the world subject to arrangement. Issuance of Guarantee against SBLC/Counter Guarantee Axis Bank Limited, Colombo issues Standby Letters of Credit / Guarantees on behalf of Banks subject to arrangement.
